post.text:
Q: "Who are you consulting with consistently so that you're ready on day one?"
Trump: "I'm speaking with myself...because I have a very good brain."

comment.author: Sampson
comment.text: Satan is hard at work in removing God from our culture/society, and I think he is using liberal democrats like Barack and Hillary to help get that done.

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: HITLARY riding Anti Christ Beast of Revelation End Times!!
